name: Hannah
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: I just want to take this moment to appreciate you. First of all, gwapa kaykaa especially when you're smiling, I really love your smile(dijud ko mapul-an og sulti ani HAHA). Second, I really appreciate all our moments together. I know I'm not the best suitor nor the best friend, but thank you for always being there for me. You make my life bearable just by being in it. You're really one of a kind. All I wish for you this Valentine's is that your life be filled with love, joy, and all the things that make your heart smile. Because you deserve it.
